results.title: Statins reduce the neurofibrillary tangle burden in a mouse model of tauopathy.
results.text_hl: We investigated the effect of statins on @<m>DISEASE_Diffuse_Neurofibrillary_Tangles_with_Calcification</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D055956 @@@NFTs@@@ in a transgenic @SPECIES_10090 @@@mouse@@@ @DISEASE_Tauopathies @DISEASE_MESH:D024801 @@@tauopathy@@@ model and found the following: 1) 1-month treatment with the blood-brain barrier-permeable agent @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ in normocholesterolemic aged @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ significantly reduced the NFT burden and decreased lectin-positive microglia; 2) @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ significantly decreased @<m>DISEASE_Diffuse_Neurofibrillary_Tangles_with_Calcification</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D055956 @@@NFTs@@@ and improved T-maze performance in young animals treated for 8 months; 3) treatment of @DISEASE_Hyperlipoproteinemia_Type_II @DISEASE_MESH:D006938 @@@hypercholesterolemic@@@ @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ for 5 months with blood-brain barrier-impermeable @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ markedly reduced the NFT burden and decreased lectin-positive microglia; 4) nonstatin @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@-lowering strategies showed a modest NFT decrease compared with statin treatment; and 5) there was a positive correlation between microglial and NFT burden (r = 0.8).

results.title: Simvastatin ameliorates cognitive impairments via inhibition of oxidative stress-induced apoptosis of hippocampal cells through the ERK/AKT signaling pathway in a rat model of senile dementia.
results.text_hl: Results of the present study demonstrated that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ significantly improved @DISEASE_Cognition_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D003072 @@@cognitive impairments@@@, memory competence, @DISEASE_Plaque_Amyloid @DISEASE_MESH:D058225 @@@amyloid plaques@@@, loss of neurons and synapses, @<m>DISEASE_Diffuse_Neurofibrillary_Tangles_with_Calcification</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D055956 @@@neurofibrillary tangles@@@ and oxidative damage in experimental @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.
